properties.name: docker.client.type
properties.description: The underlying REST client factory to be used for talking to Docker API. More Details : https://github.com/docker-java/docker-java/wiki.

properties.name: docker.client.read_timeout
properties.description: Socket read timeout for REST API calls.

properties.name: docker.client.connection_timeout
properties.description: Socket connection timeout for REST API calls.

properties.name: docker.client.max_total_connections
properties.description: Maximum number of total connections to be opened to Docker API.

properties.name: docker.client.max_per_route_connections
properties.description: Maximum number of total connections to be opened against any given route.
